response.overview: Well-meaning Madhu (Madhu Balaji) wants to help those in need, but he goes a little too far when he tries to set up his best friend, Cheenu, with a hearing-impaired girl in this family-style Tamil comedy. Madhu's heart is in the right place, but his matchmaking scheme turns into a confusing mess, and there's no telling what will happen once the dust settles. Well-known comedian and playwright Crazy Mohan scripted this rib-tickling production.
response.title: Madhu Plus Two
